code: import{Link,useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const location=useLocation();const activeLinkStyle={backgroundColor:'#8D99AE'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar navbar-expand-lg text-uppercase text-white",style:{backgroundColor:'#48435C'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-fluid p-4 mx-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"navbar-brand text-white fw-bold fs-2 ms-4",to:"/",children:"Start Framework"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"navbar-toggler",type:"button","data-bs-toggle":"collapse","data-bs-target":"#navbarNav","aria-controls":"navbarNav","aria-expanded":"false","aria-label":"Toggle navigation",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"navbar-toggler-icon"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"collapse navbar-collapse ms-4",id:"navbarNav",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"navbar-nav ms-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"nav-link text-white fw-bold",to:"/about",style:location.pathname==='/about'?activeLinkStyle:{},children:"About"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"nav-link text-white fw-bold",to:"/portfolio",style:location.pathname==='/portfolio'?activeLinkStyle:{},children:"Portfolio"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"nav-link text-white fw-bold",to:"/contact",style:location.pathname==='/contact'?activeLinkStyle:{},children:"Contact"})})]})})]})})});};export default Navbar;
